text: Raniero Cantalamessa (born 22 July 1934) is an Italian Catholic cardinal and priest. He was the Preacher to the Papal Household from 1980 until 2024, under Pope John Paul II, Pope Benedict XVI and Pope Francis. He was made a cardinal in November 2020 by Pope Francis. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Italian cardinals Category:Roman Catholic priests
title: Raniero Cantalamessa
